summary: After the loss of one of their friends, a group of unsuspecting babysitters find themselves stalked by a faceless killer who takes great pleasure in slaughtering young women on the night of Halloween. Has he returned for the rest of them?
cast: Erin R. Ryan|Marylee Osborne|Joni Durian|Tara Clark|Odette Despairr|Serendipity Lynch|Geoff Burkman|Stephanie Coffey|Chandra McCracken|David Denoyer|Amy Taint|Haley Madison|Mike Canestaro|Stephanie Michael|Marshall Norman|Rachel Ritter|Bradley Diehl|Alicia Lozier|Angela Blackford|David Storm|Victoria Baumgardner|Red Baumgardner|C. Aja Ash|Joel Bengson|Eric Widing|Daniel Setser|Matthew Brooks
keywords: murdered with a hammer|masked murderer|murder of a nude woman|nudity|murder
title: Babysitter Massacre
